data.title: Recognizing Satire is No Joke—How to Spot Satire before Sharing it as Misinformation
data.meta_description:
Students will learn what satire is and how to recognize satirical news posts online before resharing them as misinformation. This lesson focuses on a post from a satirical Disney news site.

What is “satire” and what are the rhetorical techniques to use satire?
Why is satire effective?
How can I distinguish a satirical news source from a legitimate news source?
Why is it essential to be able to recognize satire?
